name: Need More Speed
description:
Need More Speed Racer is here! The best racing game is back.
Are you ready to become the best racer in the world?
Are you ready for realistic and exciting driving experience ?

Ambitious 3D graphics, realistic vehicle physics, excellent environments are waiting you.

***FEATURES***

* 5+ race track
* 20 different car : Street, SUV, Luxury, Rally
* Easy, Medium, Hard difficulty
* Easy controllers
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* Tablet support and FULL HD support
* FULL HD graphics with high quality

Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
